attributes.action: Help all Homeless Ex service Men & Women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After spending the last four months helping the homeless within London i was Outraged to find out that around two in every five of all the homeless men and around one in every twenty women where Ex serving members of HM Forces. I find it disgraceful that after conflicts such as the Gulf the Falklands, Bosnia and Afghanistan we can allow these brave loyal individuals to be just shut out in the cold, literally. This country is better then that, these people need our help and they need it now. They served for our country so its time country repay them.
